p: The intermolecular hit reactions from round 1 informed the design of a second array of 196 reactions. The array exploited six diazo substrates (including the new substrates F3a, F2a and F7a), 16 co‐substrates (including 11 new co‐substrates) and the same two dirhodium catalysts. After screening, six additional hit reactions were identified (Figure 5a, right).
